title: Streetwear Casual
prompt: Convert this into a portrait of a man in trendy streetwear with an oversized hoodie, ripped jeans, and sneakers. Place him leaning casually against a graffiti wall with natural daylight and a shallow depth-of-field effect for an edgy, Instagram-worthy look.

title: Anime Style
prompt: Convert this photo into anime art with vibrant tones.

title: 4K Ultra-Realistic Portrait
prompt: A 4K ultra-realistic portrait of a young girl, framed from the chest up (not full body), designed for Instagram story or profile picture. The background is a luxurious Persian red carpet design (only behind her, not on the ground). Sunlight shines from one side, casting natural warm light across half of her face. She is wearing an elegant dress inspired by Persian carpet patterns with authentic Iranian colors and motifs. Her facial features remain unchanged. She is holding a Persian cat in her hands.

title: I Love Mohammad
prompt: A full-body portrait of a young man with a slight smile, wearing a white thobe and a white kufi, sitting on a red motorcycle. The motorcycle has a circular headlight and a license plate that reads 'I LOVE MOHAMMAD' in English and Arabic. The man is looking directly at the viewer. In the background, out of focus, are palm trees and an ancient-looking stone archway or building. The lighting is bright and even, suggesting an outdoor daytime setting. Take face from uploaded image, and make sure the face matches 100% with the uploaded image.

title: Vintage Gangster Style
prompt: Low-angle cinematic 3:4 half-body portrait of a young man in a Peaky Blinders-style suit, lighting a cigar under towering stained-glass windows of a grand palace. Sunbeams filter through glass, casting dramatic light. A chandelier glows above, adding luxury. Deep bokeh with sharp focus on his piercing eyes. 8K film look. Keep the original face intact.

title: Robotics Lab
prompt: Hyper-detailed 8K portrait of a young robotics engineer in a dimly lit garage. Half-body shot, intense focus on a glowing holographic robot core. Wearing a rugged hoodie with a sports watch and mask lifted under clear goggles. Background filled with metallic parts, scattered circuits, and a glass wall with robotic limbs. Orange-teal cinematic tones highlight the realism. Keep facial features unchanged.
